meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be squeezed.
meanings.sent1: The toy's squeezability made it fun to play with.
meanings.sent2: I tested the squeezability of the stress ball by pressing it firmly.
meanings.sent3: The squeezability of the sponge cake made it easy to cut into perfect slices.
meanings.sent4: The squeezability of the rubber band was like a spring ready to bounce back.
meanings.sent5: The marshmallow's squeezability was so satisfying, like a fluffy cloud in my hand.

meanings.definition: The ability to be compressed or deformed by pressure.
meanings.sent1: The suitcase's squeezability allowed me to fit in all my clothes for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The foam's squeezability made it ideal for packaging fragile items.
meanings.sent3: The squeezability of the stress ball made it a great tool for stress relief.
meanings.sent4: The accordion's squeezability reminded me of a musical instrument with a flexible soul.
meanings.sent5: The dough's squeezability was like molding clay, ready to take any shape I desired.
